title: Candy crush cheats
text: Tired of winning boosters that never show up. You can win an event with a lot of boosters that never show up when you start the next level. What is worse is when you get timed boosters that only show up when the time is almost expired. I find it hard to believe this is a bug seems more likely that they want you to pay out more $$$ to get past the difficult levels. Just a grab for the $$$.

title: Fantastic five not working
text:

title: Candy crush
text:
I do enjoy the game. It passes time and keeps me occupied. However I do not like the parts once you pass a level you have to click ok, sweet ect to move on. Itâ€™s like it gives you all these awards that honestly I donâ€™t care about. The other issue I have is when you get a candy with a stripe it knocks out the entire row...or should it? I have noticed the stripes do not knock out the entire row or activate another stripe in the row it passes so if it isnâ€™t doing this then what is the point to get a stripe? Same with when you have a special candy and you move it in a row that would then make another special candy it doesnâ€™t give it to you. Just a couple of details about the game that Iâ€™d love to see changed. 
Otherwise itâ€™s a great game.

title: Games Designed To Make You Lose
text: After a while you will start to notice random things just explode or go off even though it normally wouldn't.  and the game will actively try and destroy any plays you have. The goal is to get you to pay money. But If i know the games trying to get me to lose, i just quite and start over until eventually the game lets me win. Cause im not paying a dime to play this game. Its mostly a scam. Not really a game.
